Class NthInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.petitpoucet.function.NthInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Part

    public class NthInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements Part
    Designator related to the n-th input of a function.
